Name: Terror-Daktil 4D
About the game: Originally released in 1983 for the ZX Spectrum, Terror-Daktil 4D gave players a unique twist on the traditional arcade shooter, as they must carefully aim arcing shots at flocks of enemies. The game also contains an opening cinematic cutscene - a rarity for early 80s computer games. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version. Gameplay Survive for six days and six nights by firing arcing shots from your cannon at the fearsome Terror-Daktils. This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including: Saving/loading the game at any point Support for most modern game controllers Full control remapping Image scaling and smoothing options
